sentences.en: A sentence of a grammar is ambiguous if there exists two syntax trees for it.
sentences.cn: 如果一文法的句子存在两个语法树,那么该句子是二义性的.

sentences.en: For Sue,'syntax is all the money collected at the church from sinners. "
sentences.cn: 对苏来讲, “ syntax(句法)就是教堂从犯罪的人那儿收来的税钱. ”

sentences.en: His grammar and syntax, both in oral and written expression, were much better than the average.
sentences.cn: 无论口头还是笔头，他的文法和句法都非常出众。

sentences.en: Invalid Syntax. Cannot specify password without specifying username name.
sentences.cn: 无效语法. 不能指定密码而不指定用户名.

sentences.en: Let's investigate the syntax of Chinese.
sentences.cn: 让我们研究一下汉语的语法.

sentences.en: SAMPLE experiment as part of language syntax analysis of the achievement.
sentences.cn: 词法分析中2.实验内容SAMPLE语言语法分析部分的实现.

sentences.en: The C # language introduced new syntax to describe your designs.
sentences.cn: 语言引入了新语法描述你的设计.

sentences.en: The syntax analyzer calls the scanner when it needs a new symbol.
sentences.cn: 当语法分析程序需要新符号时,它就调用扫描过程.

sentences.en: The syntax of the language is brief to a fault.
sentences.cn: 语言本身的语法要极端简单扼要.

sentences.en: There are two aspects to any language - syntax and semantics.
sentences.cn: 语言有两个共通点:语法和语义.

sentences.en: This book is oriented towards so - called syntax - directed methods of compiling.
sentences.cn: 本书以介绍 所谓 “句法制导的编译方法”作为准则.

sentences.en: This is an invalid syntax for a hexadecimal numeric entity reference.
sentences.cn: 这是十六进制数字实体引用的无效语法.

sentences.en: You can reference arrays by their index, much like native PHP syntax.
sentences.cn: 你可以由数组索引(下标)引用数组元素, 非常像php的语法.

sentences.en: You should utilize the initializer syntax for both static and instance variables.
sentences.cn: 你应该在静态变量和实例变量上面利用初始化语法.

words.tran_cn: 句法的；语法的；依据造句法的
依照句法地；在语句构成上
语法；[计][语]句法；有秩序的排列

trans.tran_cn: 句法，句法规则[分析]，语构，语法
trans.tran_en: the way words are arranged to form sentences or phrases, or the rules of grammar which control this
